metadata.synopsis: After killing too many rats, the swarm confronts the player in a chamber beneath the Orthon's lair. A fight ensues immediately afterwards.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Killing a lot of rats in the Shar Temple and then get spotted by one of the rats

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The rat utters a defiant hiss. Bloodlust fills its little black eyes.*

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: A cacophony of angry hisses and squeaks builds. From the surrounding darkness, a large number of rat eyes glow.InternalNodeContext: Combat ensues after this dialogue.

2.text: I pleaded, I bargained, I warned. You didn't listen - you made me remember again, hurt again. I am coming for you - all of me.
